title: Work and Business 1
sentences: I work in a large office in the city center.
My boss is in a meeting today.
Have you already read the new report?
I have to send this important email immediately.
We are currently planning a new project.
What does your schedule for tomorrow look like?
Ich habe um elf Uhr einen
I have an appointment at eleven o'clock at the dentist.
Can you please print the document for me?
My colleague is helping me with the presentation.
When does the next conference begin?
I am very satisfied with my work.
Do you have a business card for me?
I am looking for a new position as an accountant.
We still have to sign the contract.
Ich mache um zwölf Uhr eine
I take a lunch break at twelve o'clock.
The client is already waiting on the phone.
I am preparing a presentation for the team.
How high is the salary for this job?
I need a signature on this form.
Are you satisfied with the result?
I am writing the invoice for the client.
The offer is only valid until Friday.
We are looking for a new employee.
I have many tasks to complete today.
für Marketing ist im zweiten Stock.
The marketing department is on the second floor.
I have a question about this project.
dictionary:
das Büro - office
der Chef - boss
der Bericht - report
die E-Mail - email
das Projekt - project
der Terminkalender - schedule / calendar
der Termin - appointment
das Dokument - document
der Kollege - colleague
die Konferenz - conference
die Arbeit - work
die Visitenkarte - business card
die Stelle - position / job
das Unternehmen - company
der Vertrag - contract
die Mittagspause - lunch break
der Kunde - client / customer
die Präsentation - presentation
das Gehalt - salary
die Anzeige - advertisement / job ad
das Meeting - meeting
die Unterschrift - signature
das Ergebnis - result
die Rechnung - invoice
das Angebot - offer
der Mitarbeiter - employee
die Aufgabe (Pl. Aufgaben) - task
die Abteilung - department
die Frage - question
das Gespräch - conversation / talk
